title: Brown v Board separate not equal

content.prompt: In Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka, the Supreme Court established which of the following principles?

choices.label: A school official can search a student for drugs.
Everyone must go to school at least until the age of 16.
Tuition for private schools cannot be tax deductible.
Separation of students by race, even in equally good schools, is unconstitutional.
A moment of silent prayer at the beginning of the school day is allowable under the First Amendment.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of required Supreme Court cases.
